question: Which famous poet wrote 'Laila Majnu' ?
explanation: The famous Sufi poet, Amir khusro wrote a famous masnavi on the love story of Laila and Majnu, \"Laila Majnu\". Excerpts of the works done by him are Tughluq Nama, Wast-ul-Hayat, Nuh Sipihr, Ashiqa, Khamsa, Baqia-Naqia, etc. He was the court poet of Alauddin Khilji and a spiritual disciple of Nizamuddin Auliya, Delhi.
